typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	filename as string ('SampleData/moviesDB.csv')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($filename)]) ~> source1
source1 derive(mydupefinder = toString(levenshtein(byName('title'),'Fawlty Towers')) + ' ' + byName('title')) ~> DQTitleMastering
DQTitleMastering derive(mycols = columnNames()) ~> DQMetadata
DQMetadata split(ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidIfCols@(Success, Fail)
